posts.description: Pierre Omidyar Provides Initial Funding of $50M to Establish First Look Media –  Omidyar Group
posts.extended: RT @mattdpearce: Omidyar just dropped $50 million into his new news thing. First Look Media is recruiting for NY, DC, SF.  via @rdevro
